评论概述: Looks cool, cheaply made.  Don't buy if you can't stitch in a better seam.
评论详情: I needed a new jacket, and liked the aesthetic of this one.  Bonus points for being a longer coat.  But the seams were definitely done the cheap way, and some material was fraying off already.  If I didn't know someone to sew in more thread for the seams it was likely to just fall apart over time.  Plus the decals for the coat don't seem safe to wash in a machine - they look and feel like they were ironed on, so I'm scared to actually send this through a wash cycle.There's a couple small things with the pockets being a bit shallow and the zipper being on the wrong side/ the end being a weird shape, but that's stuff isn't a big deal to me.As much as I overall like it, can't recommend buying it to anyone right now unless you or someone you know can reinforce the seams on the bottom of the coat and the cuffs of the sleeves.  It may fall apart if you don't.

评论概述: Epic hoodie, comfy material, and no complaints.
评论详情: I like how everything was as expected, no accidents. FYI, since the cuff ends aren’t sewn shut, it may roll back after a short time of wear. Personally I like it, but if you don’t there you go.

I really love Niepce apparel. This was pretty on par with what I've come to expect from this brand with only a few deviations. First, this is definitely a cool/tepid weather hoodie, NOT a cold/freezing weather hoodie like some of their other styles. The material is quite thin and slightly coarser than the other hoodie I own from this brand. The length is quite long and has a kind of cape effect, which is neat. The printing of the pattern on the hoodie is crisp and clear and well-done. I do think the style is more flattering on feminine body types,  I find it odd that they chose to market this as a Men's style hoodie. Otherwise, no complaints here!

This is a pretty nice light jacket. It’s more of a fashion jacket than a warm jacket so it’s best to wear when it’s not too cold. I did receive a different design than I was expecting but it’s still pretty nice. Not as nice as the spine design however.

This Cyberbunk graphic hoodie looks awesome right outside the package, and it looks even more amazing while wearing it.  The length is longer than your traditional hoodie, and the premium graphics extend from the bottom of the hoodie all the way to the hood part. The weight of the hoodie is also slightly heavier than your traditional hoodie, but overall it is still a lightweight hoodie.
This is my favorite sweater. My girlfriend took it 😫
